recipes.label: Hint: A Confounding Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Moth.

recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Moth
recipes.startdescription: I slink low, back bent and knuckling the stage. My tonal range seeks to find the edges of humanity, and my melodies will beat within the skull.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?
